description:
Disk Space Analyzer for Windows


v. 4.30 21/04/2025

- Applications and Games section
  - Improved trace detection algorithm for applications. Files Inspector now
    accurately identifies traces and calculates the disk space occupied by Steam and
    games installed through it.
  - Added dependency detection for related applications. If a user attempts to uninstall Steam
    without first removing games installed via the platform, a warning will be displayed. This
    ensures games do not become inoperable, as they may depend on Steamâ€™s framework
    (uninstallation must follow a reverse order: games first, then Steam).
  - Fixed duplicate applications in the list that occurred in some cases. For
    example, when AOMEI Partition Assistant was installed, a redundant entry named
    AOMEI Partition Assistant_is1, which served no purpose, would be added to the
    list.
- When system font scaling is changed between application launches, it now
  maintains correct window proportions.
- Bug fixed: Applications and Games section: When uninstalling COMODO Internet Security Pro, the
  standard uninstaller did not work.
